name_en: Obtained own shares and/or own interests (as a deductible item)
name_sl: Pridobljene lastne delnice oziroma lastni poslovni deleži (odbitna postavka)

name_en: Retained net profit from previous periods
name_sl: Preneseni čisti dobiček iz prejšnjih let

name_en: Retained net loss from previous periods
name_sl: Prenesena čista izguba iz prejšnjih let

name_en: Unused part of net profit for the year and/or unallocated net revenue surplus
name_sl: Neuporabljeni del čistega dobička poslovnega leta oziroma nerazporejeni čisti presežek prihodkov

name_en: Net loss for the year and/or net expense surplus
name_sl: Čista izguba poslovnega leta oziroma čisti presežek odhodkov

name_en: Revenue of sole proprietors – individuals
name_sl: Dohodek samostojnih podjetnikov posameznikov

name_en: Loss of sole proprietors – individuals
name_sl: Negativni poslovni izid samostojnih podjetnikov posameznikov

name_en: Revaluation surplus from revaluation of land
name_sl: Revalorizacijske rezerve iz prevrednotenja zemljišč

name_en: Revaluation surplus from revaluation of buildings
name_sl: Revalorizacijske rezerve iz prevrednotenja zgradb

name_en: Allowance for revaluation surplus for deferred tax assets
name_sl: Popravek vrednosti revalorizacijskih rezerv za odložene obveznosti za davek

name_en: Reserves arising from valuation of long-term investments at fair value
name_sl: Rezerve, nastale zaradi vrednotenja dolgoročnih finančnih naložb po pošteni vrednosti

name_en: Reserves arising from valuation of short-term investment at fair value
name_sl: Rezerve, nastale zaradi vrednotenja kratkoročnih finančnih naložb po pošteni vrednosti

name_en: Amounts of proved profits or losses on changes in the fair value of available-for-sale financial assets that are not part of a hedging relationship
name_sl: Zneski dokazanega dobička ali dokazane izgube iz spremembe poštene vrednosti finančnih sredstev, razpoložljivih za prodajo, ki ni del razmerja pri varovanju vrednosti

name_en: Actuarial gains or losses on certain benefits
name_sl: Aktuarski dobički ali izgube od določenih zaslužkov

name_en: Allowance for reserves due to fair value measurement for deferred tax assets
name_sl: Popravek vrednosti rezerv, nastalih zaradi vrednotenja po pošteni vrednosti za odložene obveznosti za davek

name_en: Provisions for restructuring costs of an organisation
name_sl: Rezervacije za stroške reorganizacije organizacije

name_en: Provisions for future costs or expenses of decommissioning and reinstatement and other similar provisions
name_sl: Rezervacije za pokrivanje prihodnjih stroškov oziroma odhodkov zaradi razgradnje in ponovne vzpostavitve prvotnega stanja ter druge podobne rezervacije

name_en: Provisions for onerous contracts
name_sl: Rezervacije za kočljive pogodbe

name_en: Provisions for pensions, jubilee benefits and termination benefits upon retirement
name_sl: Rezervacije za pokojnine, jubilejne nagrade in odpravnine ob upokojitvi

name_en: Provisions for guarantees given
name_sl: Rezervacije za dana jamstva

name_en: Other provisions for long-term accrued costs
name_sl: Druge rezervacije iz naslova dolgoročno vnaprej vračunanih stroškov

name_en: Government grants received
name_sl: Prejete državne podpore

name_en: Donations received
name_sl: Prejete donacije

name_en: Other long-term accrued costs and deferred revenue
name_sl: Druge dolgoročne pasivne časovne razmejitve

name_en: Long-term loans received from organisations in the group
name_sl: Dolgoročna posojila, dobljena pri organizacijah v skupini

name_en: Long-term loans received from associated organisations
name_sl: Dolgoročna posojila, dobljena pri pridruženih organizacijah

name_en: Long-term loans received from banks and organisations in the country
name_sl: Dolgoročna posojila, dobljena pri bankah in organizacijah v državi

name_en: Long-term loans received from banks and organisations abroad
name_sl: Dolgoročna posojila, dobljena pri bankah in organizacijah v tujini

name_en: Long-term financial liabilities for bonds and bills payable
name_sl: Dolgoročne finančne obveznosti v zvezi z obveznicami in menicami

name_en: Long-term lease debts
name_sl: Dolgoročni dolgovi iz najema

name_en: Long-term financial liabilities to natural persons
name_sl: Dolgoročne finančne obveznosti do fizičnih oseb

name_en: Other long-term financial liabilities
name_sl: Druge dolgoročne finančne obveznosti

name_en: Long-term loans received on the basis of loan agreements from organisations in the group
name_sl: Dolgoročni krediti, dobljeni na podlagi kreditnih pogodb od organizacij v skupini

name_en: Long-term loans received on the basis of loan agreements from associated organisations and jointly-controlled organisations
name_sl: Dolgoročni krediti, dobljeni na podlagi kreditnih pogodb od pridruženih organizacij in skupaj obvladovanih organizacij

name_en: Long-term loans received from suppliers in the country
name_sl: Dolgoročni krediti, dobljeni od drugih domačih dobaviteljev

name_en: Long-term loans received from other foreign suppliers
name_sl: Dolgoročni krediti, dobljeni od drugih tujih dobaviteljev

name_en: Long-term bills payable
name_sl: Dolgoročne menične obveznosti

name_en: Long-term advances and collaterals received
name_sl: Dolgoročni dobljeni predujmi in varščine

name_en: Deferred tax assets
name_sl: Odložene obveznosti za davek

name_en: Other long-term operating liabilities
name_sl: Druge dolgoročne poslovne obveznosti

name_en: Rented, borrowed and leased (third-party) assets
name_sl: Najeta, izposojena in zakupljena (tuja) sredstva

name_en: Bills of exchange and other securities received as security for payments
name_sl: Menice in drugi vrednostni papirji, prejeti za zavarovanje plačil

name_en: Goods received for commission and consignment sales
name_sl: Blago, prejeto v komisijsko in konsignacijsko prodajo

name_en: Monetary values issued for accounting for within the organisation
name_sl: Vrednotnice, izdane za obračunavanje znotraj organizacije

name_en: Other off-balance sheet accounts of assets
name_sl: Drugi aktivni zunajbilančni konti

name_en: Owners of rented, borrowed and leased assets
name_sl: Lastniki najetih, izposojenih in zakupljenih sredstev

name_en: Debtors who secured their payments by bills of exchange and other securities
name_sl: Dolžniki, ki so zavarovali plačila z menicami in drugimi vrednostnimi papirji

name_en: Liabilities for goods received for commission and consignment sales
name_sl: Obveznosti iz blaga, prejetega v komisijsko in konsignacijsko prodajo

name_en: Nominal value of monetary values issued for accounting for within the organisation
name_sl: Nominalna vrednost vrednotnic, izdanih za obračunavanje znotraj organizacije

name_en: Other off-balance sheet accounts of liabilities
name_sl: Drugi pasivni zunajbilančni konti
